body: Thanks for an issue. Need to update UPGRADE. Reverting it will break apps again.
There is still one behavior to investigate, but i´m lack of time. Why it only happens when request is POST and not GET

I don't think this is "just a documentation issue" as the change in cf1600411cbf71d1c28f81b64430b6319eef5f6e has some other "strange" side effects if number in $name is  is preceded by `_` or `-`

Example:
```
echo Inflector::camel2words('pic_3_url');
echo Inflector::camel2words('pic-3-url');
```

Result: `pic  3 url` (2 whitespaces before 3)
Expected: `pic 3 url`

Of course, one could say that camel2words is used incorrectly here (for this input), but this is exactly what is used in various places. For example: in the [gii model generator to create the labels](https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2-gii/blob/master/src/generators/model/Generator.php#L389).
@samdark #19204 is break BC and must be rollback
@WinterSilence it was already released so rollback is another BC break.
@samdark and what's now? rewrite existing applications? I think these changes will break more old apps than new ones at rollback.

It was a mistake, but @WinterSilence is right. The less harmful way to do it is reverting the change. I think there are less applications up to date, so it will be less hours of work reverting it on an easy way, like introducing a param to enable parsing numbers as words.

issue.title: Fix #19467: Revert changes in `Inflector::camel2words()`

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework
